Description: Verify that services have been patched
Content: Ensure that infrastructure is patched and does not have any known vulnerabilities.
If a device does not require access from the open access, restrict it, so that it is only accessible from the internal network (VPN).
Close all ports that are not required for the operation of the device targeted.
Ensure that 2FA is enabled for all services that support it.
Ensure that accounts not being used are disabled.

Description: Notify employees of increased risk level
Content: Consider informing employees of the increased risk level. Inform employees to report suspicious activity to security team.

Description: Implement URL analysis on incoming emails
Content: Determining if a URL is benign or malicious by analyzing the URL or its components.
